document.full_text: low concentrations of radioactive particles from japan's disaster-hit nuclear power plant have been heading eastwards and are expected to reach north america in days, a swedish official said on thursday.
document.title: low radioactivity seen heading towards north america
lines_and_colors: low concentrations of radioactive particles from japan's disaster-hit nuclear power plant have been heading eastwards and are expected to reach north america in days, a swedish official said on thursday.
